biotools.summary: SRD, the ‘Staphylococcal Regulatory RNA Database’ compiles all published data in a single interface including genetic locations, sequences and other features. SRD proposes a simplified and unified identifier for Staphylococcal regulatory RNAs (srn) based on the sRNA’s genetic location in S. aureus strain N315 which served as a reference. SRD provides a list of 575 srn potentially exempt of repeated sequences.

bioschemas.name: Staphylococcus regulatory RNA database (SRD)
